publications.title: A CX3CR1 Reporter hESC Line Facilitates Integrative Analysis of In-Vitro-Derived Microglia and Improved Microglia Identity upon Neuron-Glia Co-culture

genomic_modifications.description: Targeted insertion of a dual reporter donor cassette encoding tdTomato and nanoluciferase into the CX3CR1 locus using CRISPR/Cas9 nickase-based targeting; donor contained selection cassettes and homology arms.
genomic_modifications.genotype: Heterozygous knock-in of tdTomato-T2A-nanoluciferase at the CX3CR1 locus

genomic_characterisation.summary: Clones were screened by PCR and Southern blot to confirm targeting and were confirmed to be free of chromosomal aberrations via karyotyping (Figure S1F).
